data.title: Re: Silas Bryan c1915 in ?Some
data.meta_description:
Bryan: Hi Nelson
I am just starting out with the Brya... Read more on Genealogy.com!
data.text:
Hi Nelson

I am just starting out with the Bryan family and today listed the children of James Silas Bryan and his wife May Hannah Maria Jakins.These are from the Tas Fed Index.I note you are researching Silas Bryan c1815 from Somerset Bounty immigrant.Can you fill me in on some of this family please.There seems to be a gap between Silas and my son in laws James Silas Bryan born c 1873 I have a date of 29th June whether that is correct i do not know.I have 8 children for his couple.

Hope you can help

Edie
